examples: The competition is open to both teams and individuals.
La competencia está abierta tanto a equipos como a individuos.
Treatment depends on the individual involved.
El tratamiento depende del individuo involucrado.
He has persuaded private individuals (= ordinary people rather than companies, etc.) to donate to the collection.
Ha persuadido a particulares (= gente corriente en lugar de empresas, etc.) para que donen a la colección.
There is no single individual who is to blame.
No hay un solo individuo a quien culpar.
